ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those with most taqwa will be far removed from it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But the God-fearing shall be kept away from it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The pious ones who spend for the cause of God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will be far away from the most pious. (The first Caliph S. Abu Bakr Siddiq)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those with Taqwa will be far removed from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And away from it shall be kept the one who guards most (against evil),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and from which the most godfearing shall be removed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Far removed from it will be the righteous
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: One who fears God shall be kept away from it --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And avoid it shall the most pious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The Godwary [person] will be spared of that
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those most devoted to Allah shall be removed far from it,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Al-Muttaqun (the pious and righteous - see V. 2:2) will be far removed from it (Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and from which the cautious shall be distanced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But the devout will avoid it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But the righteous one will avoid it -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:17] The God-fearing one (al-atqā means al-taqī) shall be spared it, he will be removed far away from it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Far removed from it) from the Fire (will be the righteous
